skill_constraints: Monaco Editor and Jint expertise concentrated in single developers.
mitigation_strategies: Pair programming, thorough code reviews, early risk assessment.

resource_bottlenecks: QA capacity to keep up with accelerated development.
mitigation_strategies: Add a part-time frontend contractor to parallelize DTR-FE-02 and DTR-FE-03, shortening project by 2 weeks.

skill_constraints: Loss of mid-level backend developer creates a single point of failure.
resource_bottlenecks: Single backend developer becomes a bottleneck for all backend tasks.
mitigation_strategies: De-scope non-critical features like Prometheus metrics (DTR-BE-06).
